page.title: 08DAVIOT PRIMARY SCHOOL.CTD.
page.content: Each week we have a visiting teacher for P.E. Every fortnight we have a visiting art teacher. There is a little{public park across the road from the school.At lunch time we can go over to the park and play football,or play on the climbing frame,see-saw ,swings or chute.Great care has to be taken crossing the road as there are lots of lorries passing by on their way into the quarry which is right next to the school. At{lunch time,}we all stay for lunch at school. Two people bring packed lunches,but all the others have a school lunch.The lunches are cooked at a town school and brought out to Daviot.{They are very good!
